channel.title: Client On Web Page?
channel.description: How would you put a rsc easy on web page as in the client ? Also I would like to know if there is a way for me to run the server on linux ? Running .Bat files ?

item.title: Client On Web Page?
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

This is called a webclient and theres been plenty of releases.
If you want the server to run on linux, wrote a .sh file for it.
Or link them to the webclient.
Most linux users will know how to run it from there sh anyway.

Read full topic
